'aliceblue', fontSize: 30 }, link: { color: 'orange', fontSize: 50 } }; componentDidMount () { const {index} = this.props.location.state; this.setState({index}); let url = 'https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/http://api.foodforthoughtt.me/food'; console.log("first"); fetch(url) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data); const elements = data; this.setState({elements}); }) } render() { return (
